DataElement.preferredDefinition: Surpassing what is common or usual or expected._Anything that is necessary but lacking; the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior._A human who has reached reproductive age._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Sending a patient from one practitioner to another for health care services._Source; where something is available._the free text field to specify the assessment performed.

Concepts.definition: Surpassing what is common or usual or expected.

Anything that is necessary but lacking; the psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal; the reason for the action; that which gives purpose and direction to behavior.
An age group comprised of humans who have reached reproductive age.
A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
